name: d3-canvas-transition
title: d3-canvas-transition
description: Animated transitions for D3 selections on svg and canvas

scripts.test: eslint index.js src test && babel-tape-runner `find test -name '*-test.js'` | faucet
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-canvas-transition.js -c -m -o build/d3-canvas-transition.min.js && rm -f build/d3-canvas-transition.zip && zip -j build/d3-canvas-transition.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-canvas-transition.js build/d3-canvas-transition.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." v${VERSION} && git push --tags
